TopicTitle: Game bug when enter the science building

Articles.Content: Anytime I enter the science building and then try to leave I get stuck and when I try to click any button it does not work. When i try to quit the game it does not work. Every time I need to force quit. I has been now one week that it is happening and I do not know why?

I'm going to guess you might be running into this bug linked here. Give this a try and see if it helps: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105651-KSC-Buildings-Lock-Up-Can-t-Click-on-Anything-Firing-Kerbal-Crashes-Game

If not, then have a look at this thread. It will tell you what other kinds of info that we need in order to help you figure out what's going on: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw
